name: bookwyrm
description: BookWyrm is a federated social network for tracking and discussing books. Built on ActivityPub, it lets users follow others, share reviews, manage shelves, and join the federated book community using a self-hosted instance.
features: Federated Social: Connect with book lovers across the fediverse. Decentralized community.
Book Tracking: Log reading progress and manage virtual bookshelves. Organize your reading.
Reviews & Ratings: Share thoughts and discover new books. Community insights.
ActivityPub: Built on open protocol for federation. Interoperable network.
Reading Lists: Create and share curated book lists. Inspire others.
Follow Users: Connect with readers who share your interests. Build community.
Self-Hosted: Run your own instance for privacy and control. Data sovereignty.
Import Data: Bring your reading history from other platforms. Easy migration.
